div.head: William Brookes Will
div.p:
Province Maryland Charles County. In the name of God Amen
To all Christian people Know yee that I William Brookes planter
and now in my perfect sense and meory desire that I have my
last
last will and testament to bee performed & done after my departiene of this
life to the under mentioned and that they may and peacably
injoy what I freely give and bequeath unto then in consideration that
Giles Tomkins shall oat my Leavey and my dent due to Matter Danis
which is one hundred and thirty three pounds of Tobacco being all the debts
that I doe owe firsthen moon that the above said Giles Tomkins shall
give me a decent bureall.

Item. I doe give and bequeath unto my loving friend Goles Tomkins one
gray mare and fole being in his possession and all my debts that is due unto me in
Maryland that is to say by a debt due to me from
